entity.name: pages
entity.query: SELECT p.page_id as pid, p.page_namespace as pns, CAST(p.page_title AS CHAR) as pt FROM page as p

entity.name: fulltext
entity.query: SELECT CAST(t.old_text AS CHAR) ft FROM text t WHERE old_id='${pages.pid}'

entity.name: categories
entity.query: SELECT CAST(c.cl_to AS CHAR) cat FROM categorylinks c WHERE cl_from='${pages.pid}'

entity.name: smwids
entity.query: SELECT s.smw_id as smwID FROM smw_ids s WHERE s.smw_namespace='${pages.pns}' AND s.smw_title='${dataimporter.functions.escapeSql(pages.pt)}'

entity.name: rels
entity.query: SELECT CAST(pids.smw_title AS CHAR) as prop, CAST(oids.smw_title AS CHAR) as obj FROM smw_rels2 AS r LEFT JOIN (smw_ids as pids) ON (pids.smw_id = r.p_id) LEFT JOIN (smw_ids as oids) ON (oids.smw_id = r.o_id) WHERE r.s_id='${smwids.smwID}'

entity.name: atts
entity.query: SELECT CAST(pids.smw_title AS CHAR) as prop, CAST(a.value_xsd AS CHAR) as valueXSD, a.value_num as valueNum, a.value_unit as valueUnit, CAST(spec.value_string AS CHAR) as type FROM smw_atts2 AS a LEFT JOIN (smw_ids as pids) ON (pids.smw_id = a.p_id) LEFT JOIN (smw_spec2 as spec) ON (a.p_id = spec.s_id) WHERE a.s_id='${smwids.smwID}' AND (LEFT(spec.value_string,1) ='_' OR spec.s_id IS NULL)

entity.name: text
entity.query: SELECT CAST(pids.smw_title AS CHAR) as attr, CAST(t.value_blob AS CHAR) as text FROM smw_text2 AS t LEFT JOIN (smw_ids as pids) ON (pids.smw_id = t.p_id) WHERE t.s_id='${smwids.smwID}'
